title: Brand new Pixel 4a sound distortion.
content:
I immediately noticed sound distortion on key press or any other sound on the set up screens. Once set up had finished I went straight to YouTube and played a video. Terrible sound distortion. Seems like it might be the top speaker only, but can't be certain.

I can't even start the replacement process until I can 'chat' to someone tomorrow.

Unbelievable.
